Key Match Events: Mexico scraped out a 1-0 victory over Jamaica in their Group B opener in the Copa America on Saturday
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico's joy at making a winning start was tempered by what appeared to be a potentially tournament-ending injury to captain Edson Alvarez
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mexico made a winning start in the Copa America with a 1-0 victory over Jamaica
The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas, USA
Others: Gerardo Arteaga was substituted out in the 69th minute
Érick Sánchez won a free kick in the defensive half in the 90+4 minute
